name: trestbps
description: resting blood pressure (on admission to the hospital)

name: oldpeak
description: ST depression induced by exercise relative to rest

name: slope
description: the slope of the peak exercise ST segment (3 values)

name: ca
description: number of major vessels (0-3) colored by flourosopy

name: thal
description: thalassemia type: 3 values, coded as 3 (normal), 6 (fixed defect), and 7 (reversible defect)
